reviews.review: Basicamente el mejor fps de la decada lejos, besos :*
Buenardo, simplemente adictivo. Eso si, vas a romper varios escritorios del tilteo.

Counter Strike Global Offensive to moja ulubiona gra z wszystkich które posiadam i myśle że nie jednej osoby także. Oczywiście są momenty gorsze i lepsze, czasami nie pójdzie coś lub po prostu akurat to nie ten dzień lecz dzieki tym emocją ta gra jest taka wspaniala. W 10 meczach nic nie potrafisz zrobic a w 11 strzelasz jak na oprogramowaniu cheaterskim.
Dzięki za przeczytanie i pamiętaj nigdy sie nie stresuj bo to najgorsze co mozesz zrobic w tej gierce, bajo!
Bom tem alguns hacks mais isso releva
Muchos cheaters, mucho lucración a base de los juagdores, pero bueno mola :,v
The best game out there for competitive games. Wouldn't recomende buying cases and keys too exspensive. Your better off getting the games on the community market
Excelente clásico que no pierde la dinámica pese a los años. Seguramente vas a disfrutar cada minuto de juego.

Cheio re hackers e atualizações que só deixam o jogo mais lento e pioram a jogabilidade. Comunidade tóxica e a VALVE não tá nem aí pra melhorar o jogo, só quer saber de lucrar!
O que salva o jogo é a tradição que tem e as comunidades como GamersClub e FACEIT e os outros desenvolvedores não criarem um jogo com a mesma simplicidade.
fun game toxic playerbase but still fun to play even after like 6 years
just a fun games to play with friends and even by yourself
sometime shoot sometime die. is ok.

It's a pretty fun and interesting game. Takes awhile to learn the basics of the game, but once you learn them you should be good. Only problem i had was there were some toxic people who would get mad at you for doing bad and kick vote to kick you. This happened to me often when i started playing it. Another problem is there are some hackers even in level Premium. Other than that the game is lots of fun. I don't recommend you to get into skins or knives cause you will waste a lot of money on them trust me. But skins also make you win games, so there's that. Keep telling yourself that the knife you bought will go up and you will make profit. So yeah that's all i have for this review. Other than wanting to die

DS game, if you want to die I suppose this would be a great addition to your steam library, if your planning to go pro, too late, should have started in 2014. Valve is the worst company ever, look at their treatment for DotA compared to CS. Unbelievable.
Jogabilidade ótima, mapas bons para competir.

Very fun but hard to get used to.
Cooles Spiel, Casual als auch Competitive spielbar. Gerade mit ein paar Kollegen ein riesen Spaß!
